articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Asian Athletics Championships: India finish 3rd behind China and Japan with 27 medals - India Today
articles.description: India finished 3rd in the medal table at the Asian Athletics Championships 2023 with 27 medals, including 6 Golds. India finished behind Japan and China.
articles.content: By Press Trust of India: Unheralded Abha Khatua equalled shot put national record while finishing second in a surprise performance while Jyothi Yarraji and Parul Chaudhary clinched their second medal… [+4748 chars]
